channel.title: Fun Scale-Sam Logan
channel.description: I attended a conference with Sam Logan, a professor at Oregon State. He discussed using a "Fun Scale". I am unsure how to contact him and want to apply using that (if Ok) to our grant. Does anyone have access to the "Fun Scale"? Essentailly, we are looking for inventories to measure improvement in any area because a child participated in go baby go. Any help would be appreciated. thank you, Kathy

item.title: Fun Scale-Sam Logan
item.dc:creator: Pat
item.description:
I don’t have access to the “Fun Scale” but here is Sam Logan’s contact information: email - sam.logan@oregonstate.edu; his office phone is: 541-737-3437.

Read full topic

item.title: Fun Scale-Sam Logan
item.dc:creator: kathyd007
item.description:
I attended a conference with Sam Logan, a professor at Oregon State. He discussed using a “Fun Scale”. I am unsure how to contact him and want to apply using that (if Ok) to our grant. Does anyone have access to the “Fun Scale”? Essentailly, we are looking for inventories to measure improvement in any area because a child participated in go baby go. Any help would be appreciated.
thank you,
Kathy
